text: The Tombs of Atuan is the second of a series of books that are written by Ursula K. Le Guin. The book was first published in 1971 and follows on from A Wizard of Earthsea and is continued in The Farthest Shore. The Tombs of Atuan was a Newbery Honor book in 1972. ==References== Category:1971 books Category:Earthsea books Category:Newbery Honor books
title: The Tombs of Atuan
